name: Infinitesimals
description:
Infinitesimals is a story-driven, 3rd person action adventure where you play as tiny aliens who stand only 1mm tall. Though a diminutive species, they are technologically advanced and space faring. Infinitesimals features a six legged spider like vehicle ("Ajoxian Gyro POD") powered by our custom physically simulated animation system. You will be able to customise the POD both functionally and cosmetically.

You will play as Captain Orkney, a soldier caught within the huge conflict that has been raging between several factions.
